alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 1:16PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Frost and Freeze conditions expected Monday and Tuesday night... Overnight temps will be cold over the next two nights, leading to frost and freeze conditions. Expect low temperatures in the upper 20s to lower 30s in the colder valleys Monday night. On Tuesday night, low temperatures will generally be in the 30s in the colder valleys. Anyone with sensitive outside plants, crops, pets and livestock should take appropriate preventative measures. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
